'''Volcano Cake''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Volcano Cake is obtainable from a [[Chest]] in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Natlan]].

Depending on the quality, Volcano Cake revives and restores '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
